item.description:
Located just minutes from Hartford and Springfield, The Mill on the River has been a premier dining location for over 25 years. Located on the shores of the Podunk River, the restaurant is housed in a remodeled grist mill.

The classic New England ambiance is the perfect compliment to the modern American menu. The extensive brunch menu features 2 cocktails (screwdriver, bloody mary, champagne, or mimosa), freshly brewed coffee and herbal teas, offers one entree selection which can be combined with a continental brunch buffet.? All of this for only $17.95 per person.

The restaurant is located in a rural setting and is well known for it's casual ambiance, and sumptuous culinary offerings. Come join us for the food...come join us for the great conversation...come join us for the friendship!!!

See the menu below:

http://themillontheri...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Beginning 2011 with Brunch @ Mill on the River...
